history.proof: intros m z n p Hmap Hexd Hiter. induction n. - simpl. reflexivity. - simpl. rewrite <- IHn. hauto lq: on depth: 3use: Iter_plus_inv.

ctx: intros m z n p Hmap Hexd Hiter.
exceptions.exn: In environment m : fmap z : dart n, p : nat Hmap : inv_hmap m Hexd : exd m z Hiter : Iter (f m) p z = z IHn : Iter (f m) (n * p) z = z Unable to unify "z" with "Iter (f m) (n * p) z".

original: intros m z n p Hmap Hexd Hiter. induction n. - simpl. reflexivity. - simpl. rewrite <- IHn. apply Iter_plus_inv; auto.
